metadata.name: TRANSPORT (ROAD)
metadata.description:
TRANSPORT (ROAD) is the first in the series, WISH YOU WEREN'T HERE, a collection of animated postcards* from the fictitious manufacturing group, Blossom.  

'Driving the Future: Innovative Road Design and Systems  
At Blossom MFG, we understand that the road ahead is uncertain, which is why we prioritise the safety and sustainability of our products. Our road systems are your path to the future, providing you with the tools you need to overcome any obstacle and reach your destination.'

*All images and videos have been captured via unsecured surveillance camera situated around the world.
